tagline: Specializing in Lifelong Learning Agents and Reinforcement Learning

about.short: I'm a Ph.D. student at Sungkyunkwan University and visiting scholar at Carnegie Mellon University, specializing in reinforcement learning, embodied AI agents, and lifelong learning systems.
about.detailed: As a researcher at the intersection of artificial intelligence and robotics, I focus on developing intelligent agents that can continuously learn and adapt in dynamic environments. My work spans reinforcement learning, multi-modal intelligence, and embodied AI systems. Currently, I'm leading the AIER project at CMU, designing conversational robot systems for edge computing.
